messages.message: How are things at Pink Jeep?  Iga and I were just in Sedona enjoying the weather.  I am on the job hunt again.  I'd probably have to take a pay cut this time around, not much opportunity unless you know someone and already have a shoe in.  I'd love to meet sometime and we are happy to make the drive.  Any need for a software developer at the moment?  Thank you!
How are things going at pink Jeep?
